casebody.data:
James Cornell HOWARD
v.
WAYNE COUNTY CLERK OF COURT No. 362P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. James Cornell Howard, for Howard, James C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 13th of March 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wayne County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Davis, J. recused
